Namespace: iso

iso

Methods for interacting with the ISO Image endpoints
https://www.vultr.com/api/#iso
Source:
  • iso.js, line 1

Methods

create(parameters)

Create a new ISO image on the current account. The ISO image will be downloaded from a given URL.
https://www.vultr.com/api/#iso_create_from_url
Parameters:
Name Type Description
parameters object
Properties
Name Type Description
url string Remote URL from where the ISO will be downloaded.
Source:
  • iso.js, line 7

delete(parameters)

Delete an ISO image. There is no going back from this call.
https://www.vultr.com/api/#iso_destroy
Parameters:
Name Type Description
parameters object
Properties
Name Type Description
ISOID number Unique identifier for this ISO image.
Source:
  • iso.js, line 28

list()

List all ISOs currently available on this account.
https://www.vultr.com/api/#iso_iso_list
Source:

listPublic()
